content.title: Uses
content.description: Fruits are edible used to make pickle. Leaves are fodder for cattle. Fruit is highly  nutritious and source of vitamin C, minerals  and amino acids. Fruit, which has been used  in Ayurveda as a potent Rasayana  (rejuvenator). Phytochemicals including  fixed oils, phosphatides, essential oils,  tannins, minerals, vitamins, amino acids,  fatty acids, glycosides, etc are present. It has antimicrobial, antioxidant, anti-inflammatory, analgesic and antipyretic, adaptogenic, hepatoprotective, antitumor and antiulcerogenic activities.
